message: Starting schizophrenia spectrum disorder question generation. Will create 4-5 questions covering duration distinctions, clinical scenarios, and diagnostic criteria.

Crafting questions: (1) Duration-based distinctions between spectrum disorders (2) Clinical scenario requiring diagnosis based on timeline (3) Schizoaffective vs mood disorder with psychosis (4) Delusional disorder application scenario (5) Schizophreniform progression question

Successfully generated 5 high-quality schizophrenia spectrum disorder questions in valid JSON format. Questions cover all key diagnostic distinctions: duration criteria (schizophrenia ≥6 months vs schizophreniform 1-6 months vs brief psychotic <1 month), schizoaffective differential diagnosis (2+ weeks psychosis without mood symptoms), delusional disorder with preserved functioning, and progression pathways. Difficulty distribution: 1 learning, 3 application, 1 tricky. All questions include comprehensive explanations with correct reasoning and detailed incorrect option feedback.
